Name: White Chocolate Matcha Bonbon
Description: A delicate bonbon made with a hard white chocolate shell over a green tea creme.

DescriptionLocalization.ko: 단단한 화이트초콜렛 속에 녹차 크림을 채운 섬세한 봉봉.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Ein zarter Bonbon aus einer harten weißen Schokoladenschale über einer Grüntee-Creme.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 稍硬的白巧克力包裹着绿茶奶油。微微苦涩以及拥有着清香的抹茶将白巧克力的甜味发挥到极致，绿色以及白色两种淡色的简单结合让人们光是看着就觉得心旷神怡。
